reviewText: We can always count on Caillou to calm things down of to simplify our life from time to time. Nice parenting ideas too

I have a 3 and 4 year old who are crazy for Caillou but it's really hard to find DVDs with episodes that we haven't already seen on TV.  This DVD however has all new episodes that we hadn't seen before.  This is definitely a great buy for all fellow Caillou lovers!
